--- component: Keyboard shortcuts layout: main-layout.html --- Design guidelines

Summary

Keyboard commands with syntactic sugar.

Status

API status: general
Included in AUI core? Yes. You do not need to explicitly require the web resource key.
Web resource key: com.atlassian.auiplugin:ajs
AMD Module key: N/A
Experimental since: 3.0

Examples

Type "z" then "e" to execute some simple JavaScript.

Code

JavaScript

JavaScript methods

  • click
  • execute
  • followLink
  • fromJSON
  • goTo
  • moveToAndClick
  • moveToAndFocus
  • moveToNextItem
  • moveToPrevItem
  • or

fromJSON creates keyboard commands and their actions from json data. Format:
